hero_image.title: Hero image - KPI i pomiary sukcesu online
hero_image.description: Minimalistyczna kompozycja workspace z laptopem wyświetlającym dashboard analytics i KPI
hero_image.alt_text: Laptop z dashboardem KPI i analytics na czystym biurku, notatnik z celami biznesowymi
hero_image.prompt: Clean minimalist workspace top-down view, laptop displaying analytics dashboard with KPI metrics and charts, white desk, notebook with business goals written, calculator, yellow pen as accent, natural window lighting from side, muted colors black white gray with subtle yellow highlights, professional business aesthetic, high quality, shallow depth of field, no people

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: business analytics dashboard laptop workspace minimalist
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Minimalist workspace, clean desk, natural lighting, black/white/gray with yellow accent

section_media.title: Infografika - Hierarchia celów SMART
section_media.description: Pionowa infografika pokazująca hierarchię celów od strategicznych do operacyjnych z przykładami SMART
section_media.alt_text: Infografika hierarchia celów SMART dla biznesu online - strategiczne, operacyjne, mierzalne
section_media.prompt: Vertical infographic showing goal hierarchy pyramid: Strategic goals at top, Operational goals middle, SMART metrics at bottom. Clean minimalist design, numbered steps with icons, black and gray colors with yellow accents for key elements, professional business style, arrows connecting levels

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: business goals hierarchy pyramid infographic minimalist
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Pyramid structure, clean lines, numbered hierarchy, professional colors

section_media.section: Rodzaje KPI dla różnych typów biznesów
section_media.title: Porównanie KPI dla różnych modeli biznesowych
section_media.description: Tabela porównawcza pokazująca kluczowe KPI dla firm usługowych, e-commerce i B2B
section_media.alt_text: Tabela porównanie KPI dla firm usługowych, e-commerce i B2B z kluczowymi metrykami
section_media.prompt: Clean comparison table showing KPI types for different business models: Service companies, E-commerce, B2B. Three columns with metrics listed, professional chart design, minimal colors black white gray with yellow headers, organized rows, business infographic style

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: business metrics comparison table clean design
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean table design, organized columns, minimal professional styling

section_media.section: Google Analytics 4 – Twój główny instrument pomiarowy
section_media.title: Screenshot GA4 - Konfiguracja celów i konwersji
section_media.description: Zrzut ekranu interfejsu Google Analytics 4 pokazujący sekcję Events i Conversions
section_media.alt_text: Interface Google Analytics 4 z konfiguracją celów i zdarzeń konwersji
section_media.prompt: Clean screenshot mockup of Google Analytics 4 interface showing Events and Conversions setup page, professional dashboard design, highlighted important sections like conversion toggle, clean UI elements, realistic but simplified for clarity

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean dashboard interface, professional analytics screen, clear visibility

section_media.title: Diagram cyklu optymalizacji
section_media.description: Koło/flowchart pokazujący cykl Measure → Analyze → Optimize → Repeat
section_media.alt_text: Diagram cyklu optymalizacji: pomiar, analiza, optymalizacja, powtarzanie procesu
section_media.prompt: Circular flowchart diagram showing optimization cycle: Measure → Analyze → Optimize → Repeat. Four connected sections with arrows, clean minimalist design, icons for each step, professional color scheme black gray with yellow accents, business infographic style

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Circular flow design, arrows showing continuous cycle, clean professional look

section_media.title: Wykres wzrostu leadów - case study
section_media.description: Wykres liniowy pokazujący wzrost leadów firmy szkoleniowej przed i po optymalizacji
section_media.alt_text: Wykres wzrostu leadów firmy szkoleniowej z 12 do 50 miesięcznie w 6 miesięcy
section_media.prompt: Clean line chart showing lead growth over 6 months: flat line around 10 leads for first 3 months, then sharp upward trend to 50 leads. Professional chart design, blue line with data points, minimal grid, clear labels, business presentation style

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean upward trend line, professional business chart styling

section_media.title: Workspace z narzędziami analytics
section_media.description: Minimalistyczne biurko z laptopem i ekranami pokazującymi różne narzędzia: GA4, Hotjar, Clarity
section_media.alt_text: Workspace z narzędziami analytics - laptop z Hotjar, tablet z Google Analytics, notatki
section_media.prompt: Modern minimalist workspace setup showing multiple analytics tools, laptop displaying Hotjar heatmap, tablet showing Google Analytics dashboard, smartphone with website metrics, clean white desk, yellow notebook with analytics notes, professional business environment, natural lighting, no people

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: multiple devices analytics tools workspace professional
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean multi-device setup, professional workspace, analytics screens visible
